channel.title: Lorraine Gillies on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Lorraine Gillies on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Self-directed support survey
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm CM - Cathy McGregor LG - Lorraine Gillies On the 21st of February 2017, Iriss.fm spoke to Cathy McGregor and Lorraine Gillies from Audit Scotland about the National Self-Directed Support survey that has recently been circulated. Audit Scotland are keen to get as many responses as possible before the 27th of February; stories positive or negative of people's experiences of Self-Directed Support or experiences of supporting someone to use Self-Directed Support.
